mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.contract_id AS "contractId", a.company_name AS "companyName", a.address AS "address", a.link_man AS "linkMan", a.phone AS "phone", a.link_man_b AS "linkManB", a.phone_b AS "phoneB", a.path AS "path", a.create_time AS "createDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contract_info( id, contract_id, company_name, address, link_man, phone, link_man_b, phone_b, path, create_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{contractId}, #{companyName}, #{address}, #{linkMan}, #{phone}, #{linkManB}, #{phoneB}, #{path}, #{createDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE contract_info SET contract_id = #{contractId}, company_name = #{companyName}, address = #{address}, link_man = #{linkMan}, phone = #{phone}, link_man_b = #{linkManB}, phone_b = #{phoneB}, path = #{path}, create_time = #{createDate} WHERE id = #{id}
